name: Classic Miner - Multiplayer Online
description:
A brand new network multiplayer online versus version is available now! Different challenges design in new version Classic Miner. Let’s start digging your gold! Remember if player reaches triple hits, you may give opposition obstacle (stone)!

Online combat mode will bright up your game!
Invite your friend to join our online battle!
Gift pack is on SALE! We have lucky draw everyday! Want more surprises?
Share your score on “Weibo” for more rewards!
There are numerous tools to make your game remarkable!
Purchase the tools for long term usage!
